attributes.action: To make the Scottish, Welsh and English Patron Saints Day Public Holidays for each
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britain has one of the least amount of Bank Holidays per year, compared to the Republic of Ireland and Northern Ireland who also get a public holiday for St Patricks Day.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
